thread.title: BRIEF-Philippine Telegraph And Telephone Clarifies News Article

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Philippine Telegraph And Telephone Clarifies News Article

organizations.name: reuters) - philippine telegraph and telephone corp

text:
Feb 27 (Reuters) - Philippine Telegraph And Telephone Corp :
* REFERS TO NEWS ARTICLE TITLED “HOUSE PROBES PT&T FRANCHISE VIOLATIONS” POSTED IN PHILSTAR.COM ON FEB 25‍​
* CONFIRMS INQUIRY CONDUCTED ON PT&T‘S COMPLIANCE WITH FRANCHISE‘S PROVISIONS ESPECIALLY ON NEW INVESTORS’ ENTRY Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
